history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: colineaire_transitive,orthogonal_opp,orthogonal_sym. qsimpl time: 1 use: colineaire_transitive,orthogonal_opp,orthogonal_sym.

ctx: intros u u' v v' Hu Hu'.
apply orthogonal_colineaire with (w := v) in Hu.
apply orthogonal_colineaire with (w := u') in Hu'.
exceptions.tactic: apply colineaire_transitive with (w := u) in Hu; [|apply orthogonal_opp in Hu; apply orthogonal_sym in Hu].
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall u v w : V, colineaire u v -> colineaire v w -> colineaire u w" on hypothesis of type "orthogonal u' v".

ctx: intros u u' v v' Hu Hu'.
apply orthogonal_colineaire with (w := v) in Hu.
apply orthogonal_colineaire with (w := u') in Hu'.
exceptions.tactic: apply colineaire_transitive with (w := v') in Hu'; [|apply orthogonal_opp in Hu'; apply orthogonal_sym in Hu'].
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall u v w : V, colineaire u v -> colineaire v w -> colineaire u w" on hypothesis of type "orthogonal v' u'".

ctx: intros u u' v v' Hu Hu'.
apply orthogonal_colineaire with (w := v) in Hu.
apply orthogonal_colineaire with (w := u') in Hu'.
exceptions.exn: In environment H4 : forall u v : V, orthogonal u v -> orthogonal v u H3 : forall u v : V, orthogonal u v -> orthogonal u (opp v) H2 : forall u v w : V, colineaire u v -> colineaire v w -> colineaire u w u, u', v, v' : V Hu : orthogonal u' (opp v) Hu' : orthogonal v' (opp u') Unable to unify "orthogonal u' (opp v)" with "colineaire u u'".

ctx: intros u u' v v' Hu Hu'.
apply orthogonal_colineaire with (w := v) in Hu.
apply orthogonal_colineaire with (w := u') in Hu'.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros u u' v v' Hu Hu'.
apply orthogonal_colineaire with (w := v) in Hu.
apply orthogonal_colineaire with (w := u') in Hu'.
exceptions.exn: In environment H4 : forall u v : V, orthogonal u v -> orthogonal v u H3 : forall u v : V, orthogonal u v -> orthogonal u (opp v) H2 : forall u v w : V, colineaire u v -> colineaire v w -> colineaire u w u, u', v, v' : V Hu : orthogonal u' (opp v) Hu' : orthogonal v' (opp u') Unable to unify "orthogonal v' (opp u')" with "colineaire v v'".

original: intros u u' v v' Hu Hu'. apply orthogonal_sym in Hu. apply orthogonal_sym in Hu'. apply orthogonal_colineaire with (w := v) in Hu. apply orthogonal_colineaire with (w := u') in Hu'. apply colineaire_transitive with (w := u) in Hu; [|apply orthogonal_opp in Hu; apply orthogonal_sym in Hu]. apply colineaire_transitive with (w := v') in Hu'; [|apply orthogonal_opp in Hu'; apply orthogonal_sym in Hu']. apply orthogonal_opp in Hu. apply orthogonal_opp in Hu'. apply colineaire_modulo_pi. - apply colineaire_sym. apply Hu. - apply colineaire_sym. apply Hu'.
